Service Details: - Provides a camp experience specifically for children and adolescents with invisible disabilities- Neurologically based invisible disabilities most often observed at Eureka are mild Autism/Asperger Syndrome, ADD/ADHD, anxiety, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder, learning disabilities, Tourette Syndrome and Epilepsy
